about-me.title: About me
about-me.paragraph: I am Shaun, a Software Engineer based in Malaysia. I am infatuated with anything everything, especially in tech and spoken language. I write notes and guides about intriguing topics to serve as a reminder for myself and help others.

this-site.title: This site
this-site.paragraphHtml: This site is generated from Nuxt Content Template . Here is the legacy site . The design is heavily inspired by Emerge . Here is the site source code .

articlePage.title: Articles
articlePage.description: The list of reader-friendly, technical articles that I've authored over the years

notesPage.title: Notes
notesPage.description: A list of unpolished, raw snippets that I document for quick reference in the future.

footer.description: Can I just get some good night sleep already?
